Please contact us via email if interested.Education and EmploymentAssistant, Associate, and Full Professor, UNIST, Feb. 2012 - Present.Senior Researcher, KISTI, Jan. 2010 - Jan. 2012.Member of Technical Staff, VMware, Inc.
